meta.title: About us
meta.description: Learn more about our history, mission, and the leaders who guide our church.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: Pastors who guide and teach our church the Word of God

church.title: Serving since 2021
church.description: We have been serving the community since 2021, sharing the message of hope and love of Jesus Christ.

history.title: History
history.description_1: The Church was founded on January 10, 2021, with the mission of spreading the message of hope and love of Jesus Christ to the community, and since then we have been growing and serving the community.
history.description_2: Since then, we have been growing and serving the community, and we are committed to continue spreading the message of hope and love of Jesus Christ to more people.

mision.title: Mission
mision.description: To spread the message of hope and love of Jesus Christ to the community.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be a church that transforms lives through the love of Jesus Christ.

values.title: Values
values.description: These are the values that guide our church

meta.title: Contact
meta.description: Online or at our church, you can reach out and talk to us. We would be delighted to connect with you.

meta.title: We can support you in prayer
meta.description: Together as brothers and sisters, we can support you in prayer according to the situation you are facing.

meta.title: Schedule
meta.description: Join us for our gatherings throughout the week and become part of our church community.

monday.description: Focused on presenting prayers before the Lord.

wednesday.title: Wednesday Pastoral Visit
wednesday.description: Personal meeting and prayer with families.
